property.name: createToolQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.tool ( id, image, description, short_description, cpu, ram, registry_id, tool_group_id, default_command, labels, endpoints, owner, disk, instance_type) VALUES ( :ID, :IMAGE, :DESCRIPTION, :SHORT_DESCRIPTION, :CPU, :RAM, :REGISTRY_ID, :TOOL_GROUP_ID, :DEFAULT_COMMAND, :LABELS, :ENDPOINTS, :OWNER, :DISK, :INSTANCE_TYPE)

property.name: updateToolQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.tool SET cpu = :CPU, ram = :RAM, description = :DESCRIPTION, short_description = :SHORT_DESCRIPTION, default_command = :DEFAULT_COMMAND, labels = :LABELS, endpoints = :ENDPOINTS, owner = :OWNER, disk = :DISK, instance_type = :INSTANCE_TYPE WHERE image = :IMAGE AND registry_id = :REGISTRY_ID

property.name: loadAllToolsQuery
property.value: SELECT t.id, t.image, t.description, t.short_description, t.cpu, t.ram, t.registry_id, t.tool_group_id, t.default_command, t.labels, t.endpoints, t.owner, t.disk, t.instance_type, t.icon_id, dr.path as registry, dr.secret_name FROM pipeline.tool t INNER JOIN pipeline.docker_registry dr ON (t.registry_id = dr.id) WHERE (:REGISTRY_ID IS NULL OR t.registry_id = :REGISTRY_ID) AND (array_length(:LABELS_TO_SEARCH, 1) IS NULL OR array_length(:LABELS_TO_SEARCH, 1) = 0 OR :LABELS_TO_SEARCH && t.labels)

property.name: loadToolQuery
property.value: SELECT t.id, t.image, t.description, t.short_description, t.cpu, t.ram, t.registry_id, t.tool_group_id, t.default_command, t.labels, t.endpoints, t.owner, t.disk, t.instance_type, t.icon_id, dr.path as registry, dr.secret_name FROM pipeline.tool t INNER JOIN pipeline.docker_registry dr ON (t.registry_id = dr.id) AND t.id = ?

property.name: loadToolByRegistryAndImageQuery
property.value: SELECT t.id, t.image, t.description, t.short_description, t.cpu, t.ram, t.registry_id, t.tool_group_id, t.default_command, t.labels, t.endpoints, t.owner, t.disk, t.instance_type, t.icon_id, dr.path as registry, dr.secret_name FROM pipeline.tool t INNER JOIN pipeline.docker_registry dr ON (t.registry_id = dr.id) WHERE t.image = :IMAGE AND (:REGISTRY_ID IS NULL OR t.registry_id = :REGISTRY_ID)

property.name: loadToolsByGroupQuery
property.value: SELECT t.id, t.image, t.description, t.short_description, t.cpu, t.ram, t.registry_id, t.tool_group_id, t.default_command, t.labels, t.endpoints, t.owner, t.disk, t.instance_type, t.icon_id, dr.path as registry, dr.secret_name FROM pipeline.tool t INNER JOIN pipeline.docker_registry dr ON (t.registry_id = dr.id) WHERE t.tool_group_id = ?

property.name: loadToolsWithIssueCountByGroupQuery
property.value: SELECT t.id, t.image, t.description, t.short_description, t.cpu, t.ram, t.registry_id, t.tool_group_id, t.default_command, t.labels, t.endpoints, t.owner, t.disk, t.instance_type, t.icon_id, dr.path as registry, dr.secret_name, count(i.issue_id) AS issues_count FROM pipeline.tool t INNER JOIN pipeline.docker_registry dr ON (t.registry_id = dr.id) LEFT JOIN issue AS i ON i.entity_id = t.id AND i.entity_class = 'TOOL' WHERE t.tool_group_id = ? GROUP BY t.id, dr.path, dr.secret_name

property.name: loadToolsFromOtherRegistriesByImageQuery
property.value: SELECT t.id, t.image, t.description, t.short_description, t.cpu, t.ram, t.registry_id, t.tool_group_id, t.default_command, t.labels, t.endpoints, t.owner, t.disk, t.instance_type, t.icon_id, dr.path as registry, dr.secret_name FROM pipeline.tool t INNER JOIN pipeline.docker_registry dr ON (t.registry_id = dr.id) WHERE t.image = :IMAGE AND dr.path != :REGISTRY

property.name: loadToolByGroupAndImageQuery
property.value: SELECT t.id, t.image, t.description, t.short_description, t.cpu, t.ram, t.registry_id, t.tool_group_id, t.default_command, t.labels, t.endpoints, t.owner, t.disk, t.instance_type, t.icon_id, dr.path as registry, dr.secret_name FROM pipeline.tool t INNER JOIN pipeline.docker_registry dr ON (t.registry_id = dr.id) WHERE t.tool_group_id = :TOOL_GROUP_ID AND t.image = :IMAGE

property.name: updateToolIconQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.tool_icon ( icon_id, tool_id, file_name, icon ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ? )

property.name: updateToolIconIdQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.tool SET icon_id = ? WHERE id = ?

property.name: loadToolIconQuery
property.value: SELECT file_name, icon FROM pipeline.tool_icon WHERE tool_id = ?
